actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.
Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize interest subsidy payments to assist nursing homes in repair and renovation in order to comply with Federal standards.

summary.text: Authorizes interest subsidy payments under the National Housing Act to assist nursing homes in repair and renovation in order to comply with Federal standards if the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare certifies that such facilities are otherwise in substantial compliance with such standards.

titles.title: A bill to authorize interest subsidy payments to assist nursing homes in repair and renovation in order to comply with Federal standards.
